title: FDA E-Submission System (Myanmar)
main_description: A government portal for online drug, food, cosmetic, and medical device submissions with payment and verification integrations.
full_description: Developed Myanmar FDA's e-Submission System for managing regulatory approvals of Food, Drug, Cosmetic, and Medical Device products. Integrated secure payment processing, DICA API verification, and laboratory testing modules. Applied encryption for sensitive data and role-based access control to ensure security and compliance with public health standards.
features: DICA API Integration for Company Verification

title: Human Resource Management System (HRMS)
main_description: An internal HR management platform for employee, attendance, payroll, and leave management with role-based access.
full_description: Built a local-network HRMS with employee profiles, attendance tracking, training, performance evaluation, and payroll management. Integrated calendar-based leave management and detailed financial reports. Designed for secure internal use without public access, ensuring efficiency and confidentiality.

title: Post Market Surveillance System (PMS)
main_description: A post-market monitoring system to ensure safety compliance for food, drugs, cosmetics, and medical devices.
full_description: Developed a comprehensive PMS system for the FDA to track and analyze product safety and adverse events. Includes certificate verification, reporting modules, and risk assessments. Implements encryption for sensitive data and AJAX-based real-time reporting dashboards.

title: ePhyto Certificate System
main_description: A digital platform for phytosanitary certificate management with TradeNet API and online payment integration.
full_description: Built the ePhyto system to issue and manage phytosanitary certificates digitally. Integrated TradeNet API for automated submission and DICA verification for company registration. Implemented real-time tracking, role-based access control, and secure data encryption.

title: POS & Online Shop System
main_description: A modern POS and e-commerce system for managing sales, products, and inventory efficiently.
full_description: Developed a Point-of-Sale and Online Shop system for small to medium businesses. Includes inventory management, sales tracking, and customer order management with dynamic reporting. Designed a responsive user interface for both desktop and mobile users.

title: Travel & Tour Management System
main_description: A complete travel and tour booking platform with package management, customer booking flow, invoicing, and admin control panel.
full_description: Developed a full-featured Travel & Tour Management System to streamline package listings, customer bookings, itinerary management, and automated invoicing. Designed with a mobile-responsive UI for customers and a secured admin dashboard for managing tours, pricing, promotions, and bookings. Includes real-time availability tracking and an optimized booking workflow.
features: Responsive Design for Mobile and Desktop

title: GitLab Private Server Deployment
main_description: Deployed and configured a secure GitLab private server for internal company development workflows, CI/CD pipelines, and repository management.
full_description: Implemented a company-wide GitLab private server to centralize code repositories, automate deployments, and enhance development workflow security. Configured SSH key-based authentication, runner setup for CI/CD pipelines, backup automation, and monitoring. Optimized server performance and ensured high availability for daily development operations.

title: Enterprise Server Infrastructure & DevOps Deployment
main_description: Designed and deployed a secure, scalable Linux-based production infrastructure with automated backups, queue processing, server hardening, Redis caching, and optimized application hosting.
full_description: Deployed a complete production-ready infrastructure on Ubuntu Linux including web, application, and database server layers. Configured Apache/Nginx hosting, PHP with extensions, and Composer for dependency management. Implemented MySQL optimization, Redis caching, and Supervisor for queue workers to support high-performance job processing such as email sending and background tasks. Set up automatic database backups via cron, secure firewall rules, SSL termination, and system hardening. Managed file server configuration, log rotation, and caching strategies to ensure stability, security, and scalability.
features: Job Scheduling with Cron (emails, tasks, cleanup)
Automated Daily Database Backups with Cron
Separate Web, Database, and Application Configurations
System Monitoring, Log Rotation & Performance Tuning

title: Infinity Subscription UI Showcase
main_description: A modern and responsive subscription and product showcase UI built with React, Vite, and TailwindCSS, designed for fast performance and clean visual presentation.
full_description: Infinity is a frontend-only React application powered by Vite for blazing-fast development and TailwindCSS for modern, utility-first styling. The UI showcases subscription plans, product categories, and smooth animated interactions. The project uses DaisyUI for component styling, React Router for navigation, and mock JSON data to simulate real API responses. Designed to highlight strong UI/UX design, component reusability, and modern frontend architecture.
features: Dynamic Product Listing with Category Filters
Smooth Page Navigation Using React Router
Responsive UI Built with TailwindCSS & DaisyUI

title: Kaung Htet Zaw â€” Personal Portfolio
main_description: A fully responsive and modern personal portfolio built with React, Vite, and TailwindCSS, featuring smooth animations, optimized routing, and a clean UI design to showcase skills, projects, and contact information.
full_description: This portfolio website is a modern, high-performance frontend project designed to highlight my skills, professional experience, and showcased projects. Built using React and Vite for speed and efficiency, the UI is styled with TailwindCSS and DaisyUI for clean and consistent design. Framer Motion provides elegant animations, while React Router enables smooth page transitions. The contact form is integrated with EmailJS, allowing for direct email communication without a backend server. The site is fully responsive, optimized for fast loading, and deployed on a custom domain.

title: Task Management System
main_description: A comprehensive task management system built with Laravel, MySQL, and jQuery, designed to streamline task tracking, reporting, and team collaboration on Ubuntu servers with Apache.
full_description: This Task Management System is a full-featured web application built with Laravel and MySQL. It allows teams to create, assign, and track tasks efficiently. The system uses jQuery and Bootstrap for interactive UI elements, supports report generation, and runs on Ubuntu servers with Apache for stable deployment. The project emphasizes backend logic, database optimization, and clean frontend interactions for a seamless user experience.
